field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: High - Cost: High for premium SKUs - Sku.Capacity is recommended

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Medium (Name and Resource Group recommended)

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: High - (SKU = Free or Basic) - Cost: Med - Underlying compute resources. Defaults to "Basic" sku when created through the portal. Denied for High-Threat audiences. (Under Review)

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low (Ancilliary) - Can be limited to specific language (ie Powershell) to increase friction.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: BANNED - High-Threat Audience: Restricted - Orphan causes threat to platform availability. Id_202

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Medium - Cost: Medium - Notes: Costs ~5$/hour for premium. Low skus are ~0.05$/hour

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: High - Cost: Very High - Notes: Very high = >40$/hour for some Enterprise skus. Low skus are ~0.1$/hour

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low - Notes: VMs managed with VM specific restrictions

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low - Ancilliary - Notes: Not required

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: High (Crypto/Compute) - Cost: High - Notes: Recommend ImageOffer, ImageId

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: High (Crypto/Compute) - Cost: High - Notes: Recommend Name Pattern when associated with VMSS

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: High (Crypto/Compute) - Cost: High - Notes: Recommend Image. Name pattern allowed for LOW Threat audiences.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Restricted (Unmitigated) - Cost Very High - Notes: Denied for High-Threat Audiences

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Very High - Cost: Very High (>$100/day) - Notes: Under Review. Requires Teardown LCA. See specific resources in this namespace. Corresponding VMs require highly-permissive policies. May not be grantable for high threat audiences.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Very High - Cost: Very High (>$100/day) - Under Review. Requires Teardown LCA. SKU.Tier recommended. High-Cost resources that incure costs when saved/orphaned. Treat with extreme caution.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Unassessed - Cost: high - Notes: Restrict where possible.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Unassessed - Cost: high - Notes: Restrict where possible.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: BANNED - Notes: Use Recovery Service Vaults instead. Considered only for grandfathered content. Produces Orphans

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low - Recommend Name and Resource Group

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low - Recommend Name and Resource Group

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Very High (Crypto/Compute) - Cost: Very High - Notes: Denied for High-Threat Audience

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low - Notes: Easily orphaned, will incure ongoing costs if not torndown properly. May require Teardown. Recommend Name and Resource Group.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Restricted - Cost: Very High - Notes: Arbitrary compute, known as Azure Load Testing or Azure App Testing

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Restricted - Cost: Very High - Notes: Arbitrary compute, known as Azure Load Testing or Azure App Testing

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Restricted - Cost: Very High - Notes: Arbitrary compute, known as Azure Load Testing or Azure App Testing

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Very High (Crypto/Compute) - Cost: Very High - Notes: - Workspaces sku can have transient "Exists" : "False" during deployment. Denied for High-Threat audience.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low - Cost: Very High for some resource types(ex: Gateways). Notes: May require tear-down LCA. Recommend Name and Resource Group. Some high-cost resources, low risk otherwise.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low - Notes: Recommend Name and Resource Group.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: High (Orphans) - Notes: May require tear-down

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Medium - Cost: High - Notes: Recommend SKU. Workspaces sku can have transient "Exists" : "False" during deployment

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Banned - Cost: Extremely High - Notes: Contact the SRT@skillable.com if you require this resource for any purpose. Do not expect a fast turn around. Cost can be >$100USD per execution

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low (Orphans) - Cost: Low - Notes: Requires Teardown LCA. Easily orphaned, will incure ongoing costs if not torn down properly.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Medium - Cost: Very High - Notes: >8$/hour for high skus.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low (Orphans) - Notes: Requires Teardown LCA

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: High (Crypto/Compute) - Under Review - Notes: May require novel restrictions (SKU field not present)

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Medium (Compute) - Cost: Very High. - Notes: Master DB's can have sku.name "System", sku.tier: "System", sku.capacity: 0.

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Medium (Compute) - Cost: High - Notes: Recommend sqlInstanceSettings.maxServerMemoryMB

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low - Cost: High (for Hot Tiers) - Notes: Requires Teardown LCA. Recommend Name, Resource Group

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low (Orphans) - May require tear-down LCA

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Restricted - Cost: Very High - Notes: High-Risk, Denied for High-Threat audience

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: High (Crypto/Compute) - Cost: Very High - Notes: Recommend Kind when Name not available (eg: function apps)

field.name: NOTE
field.value: Risk: Low (Ancilliary) - Cost: Low - Notes: Recommend Name, Resource Group. See Microsoft.Web/serverfarms for underlying compute.
